page.title: 18Verse about Wetton
page.content:
{Wetton} Wetton is near Alstonefield, It isn't very big, but the people who live there can cope for themselves. It is within the parish of Ecton and a hamlet by the Manifold. The co-ordinates for Wetton are 105555. There is one carpark which is outside the public house.
Beautiful Garden The beautiful garden in its peace and glory, Somebody spent so long to make it what it is, Maybe there's something inside them that keeps them going or just the joy of making something as glamourous as that garden. I only wish it could be mine.
